dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The dataset includes many annotations such as Velodyne LiDAR 3D scans, object bounding boxes and tracks, calibration, depth and IMU. It is used for trajectory prediction by collecting 6 seconds chunks (2 seconds for past and 4 for future) in a sliding window fashion from all trajectories in the dataset.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: Will Maddern
Geoffrey Pascoe
Chris Linegar
Paul Newman
dcterms:description: The Oxford RobotCar dataset consists of 6 seconds trajectories divided into 2 seconds for past and 4 for future, adapted for trajectory prediction to show zero-shot transfer capabilities on different domains.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar

dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts
Mohamed Omran
Sebastian Ramos
Timo Rehfeld
Markus Enzweiler
Rodrigo Benenson
Uwe Franke
Stefan Roth
Bernt Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is used for semantic urban scene understanding and has been adapted for trajectory prediction with shorter videos and predictions made only up to one second in the future.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Alon Lerner
Yiorgos Chrysanthou
Dani Lischinski
dcterms:description: ETH dataset contains top-view trajectories of pedestrians, with social interactions such as group actions, collision avoidance, and crossing trajectories, used for social trajectory prediction.
dcterms:title: ETH

dcterms:creator: Stefano Pellegrini
Andreas Ess
Konrad Schindler
Luc Van Gool
dcterms:description: UCY dataset contains top-view trajectories of pedestrians in various scenarios, used for social trajectory prediction with social interactions.
dcterms:title: UCY

dcterms:creator: Alexandre Robicquet
Amir Sadeghian
Alexandre Alahi
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: Stanford Drones Dataset (SDD) contains trajectories of agents roaming in a university campus, acquired via a birdâ€™s eye view drone, used for trajectory prediction.
dcterms:title: Stanford Drones Dataset (SDD)
